Details: Digital immunisation registry under UIP; QR-based certificates, SMS reminders, self-registration, and real-time tracking of routine vaccines.
Phased rollout of human papillomavirus vaccination to prevent cervical cancer; linked with school health and public vaccination campaigns.
Intensified routine immunisation campaign ensuring all missed children and pregnant women receive vaccines under UIP.
Ongoing research to evaluate whether BCG provides broader immune benefits against respiratory diseases in adults; not yet a public immunisation program.
